import React, { useCallback } from 'react'; import { useDropzone } from 'react-dropzone'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; const Submit = () => { const onDrop = useCallback((acceptedFiles) => { acceptedFiles.forEach((file) => { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onabort = () => console.log('file reading was aborted'); reader.onerror = () => console.log('file reading has failed'); reader.onload = () => { // Do whatever you want with the file contents const binaryStr = reader.result; console.log(binaryStr); }; reader.readAsArrayBuffer(file); }); }, []); const { getRootProps, getInputProps } = useDropzone({ onDrop }); return (

Submit a design!

If you have an open source design to contribute to the makerspace, please submit it here!

Design Name Category Description Proof of Certification To be certified on Resource 19, a design has to provide proof of approval by one of the following institutions: CDC, ECDC, FDA, NIH, or WHO. Designs approved by individual research institiutions such as Universities or others may also be approved on a case by case basis Please provide proof of approval below in the form of a link. Would you like to submit your design for certification? Materials Tools Required Links (Links separated by commas) Images (JPG, PNG) console.log(acceptedFiles)}> {({ getRootProps, getInputProps }) => (

Drag 'n' drop some files here, or click to select files

)} Attachments (PDFs, CAD files, etc.) Give credit where credit is due. Who made this design possible?
); }; const style = { BodyContent: { margin: '0 10% 3rem 10%', }, HeaderSection: { background: '#EBF0F3', padding: '1rem 10%', }, Header1: { fontSize: '42px', color: '#3B628B', margin: '.3rem 0 0 0', }, Subtitle: { fontSize: '24px', fontWeight: '300', color: '#3B628B', paddingTop: '0.8rem', marginBottom: '0', }, FormHeader: { fontSize: '20px', fontWeight: '400', margin: '1rem 0 0.2rem 0', }, FormSubtitle: { fontSize: '16px', fontWeight: '300', marginBottom: '0.4rem', }, }; export default Submit;
